posts.title: Falling Bookends
posts.content: Sometimes the weight of knowledge contained in a book can crush a man, but sometimes just the weight of a book can literally crush a man as seen with this clever falling bookends that display a tiny man about to be obliterated by the falling books.

posts.title: Star Wars 3D Lamps
posts.content: Keep your young Padawan’s room looking stellar with one of these Star Wars 3D lamps. The lamp mounts directly onto the wall and creates the effect that a beloved Star Wars character such as Yoda or Darth Vader  has crashed through like the Kool-Aid Man.

posts.title: Haunted Skull Cakelet Pan
posts.content: Give your little monsters something to scream about at snack time by whipping up some spooky treats using this haunted skull cakelet pan. The pan is crafted from cast aluminum for superior baking performance and lets you make up to six miniature skulls per batch.

posts.title: Metal Drinking Straw
posts.content: Stop drinking with those sissy plastic straws – you’re a grown ass man and now you can drink like one too with the metal drinking straw. This titanium drinking straw is so tough you might even find it beating up those wimpy straws in the pantry cabinet when you aren’t looking.

posts.title: Best Bitches Pendant
posts.content: Celebrate the special bond you share with your ride or die squad by cementing it with this classy “Best Bitches” pedant. This silver colored pendant breaks away into three pieces that spell out “Best Bitches” when they’re joined together.

posts.title: Plastic Zombie Army Men
posts.content: Complete your zombie apocalypse diorama with these disturbing plastic zombie men toys. Inspired by The Walking Dead zombie show and comic book, these Army Men toy like figurines come with ten zombies per bag – five brown and five green.

posts.title: Creepy Wedding Cake Toppers
posts.content: Celebrate your unique brand of love like only a couple of off-beat soul mates can – with the creepy wedding cake toppers. The topper serves as the perfect touch to any cake and is sure to be a hit among guests once they get a peek at the unicorn bride and horse groom.

posts.title: Breville Smart Oven
posts.content: The Breville smart oven is your ticket to enjoying delicious home-cooked meals on a nightly basis. Whether it’s cooking, baking, dehydrating, or air-frying, this oven features 13 helpful preset functions designed to deliver precise cooking temps for perfect results.

posts.title: Book House Lamp
posts.content: Add the perfect touch to any bedside or cozy reading nook with the cute and useful book house lamp. This quaint reading lamp is shaped like a small home you make whole every time you place your book book atop its roof to save your place.

posts.title: Aerial Yoga Hammock
posts.content: Take your yoga workout to new heights when you begin practicing on the aerial yoga hammock. Once safely anchored, the hammock suspends you mid air and features foot stirrups so that you can perform gravity-defying moves in glorious ass hugging yoga pants.

posts.title: Red Velvet Oreo Cookies
posts.content: Treat yo self to the best snack you’ll ever have with red velvet Oreo cookies. These delectable limited edition cookies bring you the classic Oreo taste you love with an amazing red velvet twist – complete with cream cheese filling.

posts.title: Worst Case Scenario Survival Book
posts.content: There’ll be no catching you off guard after you read the Worst Case Scenario Survival book. After studying its informative pages, you’ll know how to make it out alive from any imaginable situation such as getting abducted by aliens or navigating a minefield.
